Roosters are male chickens often found in farms with other chickens. They can be fought as low-level monsters, having similar stats to other chickens and sharing the same drops.

They can be found in Freda's yard on the Death Plateau, the chicken pen in Rellekka and in Miscellania market.

There is also a non-attackable miniature rooster in the Falador farm standing on the top of the box in the chicken pen.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Postbag from the Hedge #38 has noted that it would take 5,308 roosters to make it through the TzHaar Fight Cave and have a chance at beating TzTok-Jad.
